title: Generalised Hammerstein–Wiener system estimation and a benchmark application

tldr.text: This paper examines the use of a so-called “generalised Hammerstein–Wiener” model structure that is formed as the concatenation of an arbitrary number of Hammerstein systems to be effective and, via Monte-Carlo simulation, relatively robust against capture in local minima.
